title: Someone stole my friends account
body: One day my friend and I got a message in a club that said (click this link to get 3250 RP FREE). I didnt touch it but my friend clicked the link and logged in. Since his email wasn't confirmed someone stole his account. His name is --snip--and he has spent a lot of money on RP so it would be awful if his account got lost. Is there any way to get his account back? If anyone have any ideas i would be thankful if you would be willing to help. I would do anything to help my friend get his account back.

replies.body: Aw damn, sounds like he fell for a phishing scam.  :(  I've edited out the account in your post for privacy, but locked it as a security measure to prevent further unauthorized access.  Have him reach out through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can help him directly.
